1.name: The Shining
1.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

2.name: The Blues Brothers
2.description: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

3.name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
3.description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

4.name: The Blue Lagoon
4.description: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

5.name: Superman II
5.description: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

6.name: Flash Gordon
6.description: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

7.name: Caddyshack
7.description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

8.name: Airplane!
8.description: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

9.name: Friday the 13th
9.description: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which, years before, was the site of a child's drowning.

10.name: Cannibal Holocaust
10.description: During a rescue mission into the Amazon rainforest, a professor stumbles across lost film shot by a missing documentary crew.

11.name: Raging Bull
11.description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring destroys his life outside of it.

12.name: The Elephant Man
12.description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of intelligence and sensitivity.

13.name: Popeye
13.description: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

14.name: Used Cars
14.description: When the owner of a struggling used car lot is killed, it's up to the lot's hot-shot salesman to save the property from falling into the hands of the owner's ruthless brother and used-car rival.

15.name: Nine to Five
15.description: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

16.name: Ordinary People
16.description: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

17.name: The Gods Must Be Crazy
17.description: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

18.name: Dressed to Kill
18.description: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

19.name: Altered States
19.description: A Harvard scientist conducts experiments on himself with a hallucinatory drug and an isolation chamber that may be causing him to regress genetically.

20.name: Humanoids from the Deep
20.description: Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.

21.name: The Final Countdown
21.description: A modern aircraft carrier is thrown back in time to 1941 near Hawaii, just hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

22.name: Heaven's Gate
22.description: A dramatization of the real-life Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, in which a Sheriff born into wealth, attempts to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

23.name: The Fog
23.description: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.

24.name: Fame
24.description: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

25.name: The Changeling
25.description: A man staying at a secluded historical mansion finds himself being haunted by the presence of a spectre.

26.name: Xanadu
26.description: A struggling artist living in Los Angeles meets a girl who may hold the key to his happiness.

27.name: Cruising
27.description: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

28.name: Inferno
28.description: An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.

29.name: Somewhere in Time
29.description: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

30.name: Coal Miner's Daughter
30.description: Biographical story of Loretta Lynn, a legendary country singer that came from poverty to worldwide fame. She rose from humble beginnings in Kentucky to superstardom and changing the sound and style of country music forever.

31.name: Saturn 3
31.description: Two lovers stationed at a remote base in the asteroid fields of Saturn are intruded upon by a retentive technocrat from Earth and his charge: a malevolent eight foot robot.

32.name: Urban Cowboy
32.description: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

33.name: Battle Beyond the Stars
33.description: A young farmer sets out to recruit mercenaries to defend his peaceful planet, which is under threat of invasion by the evil tyrant Sador and his armada of aggressors.

34.name: Maniac
34.description: A psychotic man, troubled by his childhood abuse, loose in New York City, kills young women and takes their scalps as his trophies. Will he find the perfect woman in a photographer, and end his killing spree?

35.name: Stir Crazy
35.description: Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in.

36.name: Foxes
36.description: A group of four teenage girls come of age in the asphalt desert of Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley arranged with a blazing soundtrack and endless drinking, drugs and sex.

37.name: Prom Night
37.description: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

38.name: The Hollywood Knights
38.description: Led by their comedic leader, Turk, the Hollywood Knights car club raise hell throughout Beverly Hills on Halloween Night, 1965. Everything from chaotic pranks, drag racing and high school ...                See full summary »

39.name: Tom Horn
39.description: An ex-army scout is hired by ranchers to kill cattle rustlers but he gets into trouble with the corrupt local officials when he kills a boy.

40.name: The Hunter
40.description: The story of professional bounty hunter Ralph "Papa" Thorson.

41.name: Any Which Way You Can
41.description: A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.

42.name: Kagemusha
42.description: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

43.name: American Gigolo
43.description: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

44.name: My Bodyguard
44.description: When a boy comes to a new school and gets harassed by a bully, he acquires the services of the school's most feared kid as a bodyguard.

45.name: Galaxina
45.description: The crew of the police cruiser Infinity is finally heading home after a long stay in deep space. Just when they think they are about to get some much needed rest and relaxation, the crew is...                See full summary »

46.name: The Long Good Friday
46.description: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

47.name: Little Darlings
47.description: Two fifteen year-old girls from different sides of the tracks compete to see who will be first to lose their virginity while at camp.

48.name: The Dogs of War
48.description: Mercenary James Shannon, on a reconnaissance job to the African nation of Zangaro, is tortured and deported. He returns to lead a coup.

49.name: Alligator
49.description: A baby alligator is flushed down a Chicago toilet and survives by eating discarded laboratory rats injected with growth hormones. The small reptile grows gigantic, escapes the city sewers, and goes on a rampage.

50.name: The Ninth Configuration
50.description: A former marine arrives at a mental asylum housed in a remote castle to run it. There he attempts to rehabilitate the patients by letting them act out their craziest fantasies and desires.
